mapper.select: select w.platform_id, w.title, w.link, w.image_link, w.genre, w.story, w.artist, w.score, w.id from webtoon w order by w.score desc;

select c.id as characteristic, c.drawing_style, c.humor, c.romance_ratio, c.genre_score, c.deployment_speed, c.material_novelty, c.webtoon_id as id, (c.drawing_style - #{drawing_style} + c.humor - #{humor} + c.romance_ratio - #{romance_ratio} + c.genre_score - #{genre} + c.deployment_speed - #{deployment_speed} + c.material_novelty - #{material_novelty}) as result,
(case when (c.drawing_style - #{drawing_style} + c.humor - #{humor} + c.romance_ratio - #{romance_ratio} + c.genre_score - #{genre} + c.deployment_speed - #{deployment_speed} + c.material_novelty - #{material_novelty}) < 0 then (c.drawing_style - #{drawing_style} + c.humor - #{humor} + c.romance_ratio - #{romance_ratio} + c.genre_score - #{genre} + c.deployment_speed - #{deployment_speed} + c.material_novelty - #{material_novelty}) * -1 else (c.drawing_style - #{drawing_style} + c.humor - #{humor} + c.romance_ratio - #{romance_ratio} + c.genre_score - #{genre} + c.deployment_speed - #{deployment_speed} + c.material_novelty - #{material_novelty}) end) as result_done , w.title, w.link, w.image_link, w.genre, w.story, w.platform_id, w.artist, w.score from characteristic c, webtoon w where c.webtoon_id = w.id order by result_done asc limit 1;
